faq.title: Any kind of cms and frameworks
faq.desc: We do web development on your demand. we have experience with any kind cms and frameworks like wordpress, codeigniter, laravel, Yii2, nodejs, reactjs, Django etc

faq.title: Realiable and managed websites
faq.desc: We create static and dynamic website for you where you won't need to do anything. All will be managed by our experts. You will get a dashboard too with dynamic websites where you can manage website by yourself.

faq.title: Security and vulnerability Proved
faq.desc: All our works is tested by experienced QA engineer multiple times, so you never going to face any security issue. We look after every website we made before.

faq.title: Classic and modern websites
faq.desc: We make custom website that will be classic or modern design based on your demand. We have readymade website, custom made website, and rebuilding service too.

items.title: Business websites
items.desc: Company, tourism, ecommerce, online business, school-collage-university, hospital-clinic, online booking websites etc.

items.title: Media websites
items.desc: Newspaper, e-paper, online radio, online TV, IPTV, job portal, matrimonial and any kind of online media websites.

items.title: Personal websites
items.desc: Personal portfolio, personal profile, biodata, personal file server, appointment and any kind of personal websites.

items.title: Others custom website
items.desc: Network restricted website, server website, domain hosting selling website, and any kind of custom website we can make.
